Timer.mode

機能/意味
mode
タイプ
Timerクラスのプロパティ (読み書き可能)
説明
　Indicates the mode of operation. You can also set a value.
　Specify one of the following values:
atmNormal : Events are delivered at the normal event delivery priority.
atmExclusive : Delivered in preference to other asynchronous events
atmAtIdle : Delivered when idle (no more events to deliver).
参照
AsyncTrigger.mode
